content: स्थपति {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्था-क तस्य पतिः] Chief, principal. --तिः {@--1@} A king, sovereign. {@--2@} An architect. {@--3@} A wheel-wright, master-carpenter. {@--4@} A charioteer. {@--5@} One who offers a sacrifice to Bṛhaspati. {@--6@} An attendant on the women's apartments. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kubera.
